name: MIX IT!
description:
Overview:

Embark on a captivating space adventure with Mix It!, an innovative game that seamlessly blends entertainment with education. As an Astropilot undergoing the rigorous training program, players will delve into the mysteries of the universe, exploring the fascinating physical properties of light in an engaging and interactive way.

Key Features:

Astropilot Training Program:
Immerse yourself in the role of an Astropilot and undergo a comprehensive training program designed to teach you about the physics of light.
Navigate through stunning space environments and tackle challenges that require an understanding of light properties to progress.

Educational Exploration:
Learn and apply concepts related to reflection, refraction, and color theory as you traverse the universe. Mix It! seamlessly integrates educational elements into the gameplay for an enriching experience.

Award-Winning Design:
Proud recipient of prestigious awards, including Game Jam Plus' Best Sound Design, Best Game about Color (sponsored by Anjo Tintas), and Best Game of Costa Rica. Additionally, Mix It! received a nomination at the VIT awards 2023.

Immersive Visuals:
Marvel at the breathtaking visuals of space, enhanced by vibrant colors and mesmerizing light effects. Mix It! leverages cutting-edge graphics to create an immersive and visually stunning gaming experience.

Dynamic Gameplay Mechanics:
Engage in dynamic gameplay that combines exploration, and skill-based challenges. Each level presents new and exciting opportunities to apply your knowledge of light physics.

Community and Recognition:
Follow @t3ampo on social media, and join a growing community of players passionate about science, space, and gaming. Share your experiences, participate in discussions, and stay updated on the latest news through community channels. (Instagram, Twitch, and X)
